name: pool2
description: Resource pool built with database drivers in mind

scripts.test: NODE_ENV=testing mocha -u bdd -R spec --bail test/*.test.js;jshint lib/*.js
scripts.cov: NODE_ENV=testing istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -u bdd -R spec --bail test/*.test.js;jshint lib/*.js

author: Kris Reeves
